name: Sunset Bike Racer - 2D Motocross Racing
description:
Kick the starter and push the limits of your motocross bike racing skills.

Please leave a comment. Thank you :-)

.

CONTROLS
Use the ARROW keys or WASD to control the rotation.
SPACE to speed up
CTRL to brake
SHIFT or ALT to boost

.

THE GAME

★ BIKE PHYSICS ★
Enjoy the nicely tuned bike physics and survive those treacherous tracks I have set up for you.

★ COMPETE AGAINST THE MILLION ★
Try your best to beat the clock and see how you compare against your friends' or your own time. Over one million players have played this game on Android. Can you beat their time?

★ EARN YOUR STARS ★
Be the quickest rider in this quest for stars. Only the best can unlock three stars on all tracks and with it the fastest bike in the game.

★ SECRETS & STUNTS ★
Accelerate your bike to ridiculous speeds with the nitro booster. Refill it by performing stunts like frontflips, backflips or up hill wheelies. Find all the secret paths and shortcuts.
